Pre-Game Insights: England are in great form which helped them dismiss India in the semi-final
Pakistan had a rollercoaster campaign in the T20 World Cup
Others: The International Cricket Council (ICC) on Friday announced the match official for the final clash between Pakistan and England in the ongoing T20 World Cup
Umpires Marais Erasmus and Kumar Dharmasena will assume on-field duties in the final of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup 2022 to be played at the iconic Melbourne Cricket Ground (MCG)
Chris Gaffaney will be the TV umpire for the match while Paul Reiffel will be the fourth umpire
